data.name: endpoint_select
data.label: OBS service connection info
data.description: Select a service extension point which type is IAM account

validation.required_message: Select the corresponding OBS service connection information. If no OBS service extension point exists, create a service extension point which type is IAM account

data.name: endpoint
data.label: OBS endpoint information
data.description: Please input your OBS endpoint info,refer to the link for details:https://developer.huaweicloud.com/intl/en-us/endpoint?OBS

extend_prop.show_placeholder: If your OBS is located in Huawei cn-north-4,please input:https://obs.cn-north4.myhuaweicloud.com

validation.required_message: The endpoint information cannot be empty

data.name: bucket
data.label: OBS bucket name
data.description: Please enter the name of the OBS bucket that you want to operate

extend_prop.show_placeholder: Please input your OBS bucket name

data.name: key
data.label: OBS Object path in the bucket
data.description: Enter the path information about the files in the OBS bucket to be downloaded

extend_prop.show_placeholder: Please input files in OBS you need to download files to the local directory, for example, /test/. All files prefixed with /test are downloaded

validation.required_message: OBS file path cannot be empty

data.name: save_as_file
data.label: Local storage path
data.description: Enter the path of the local file to be downloaded, the relative path and the full type of the file. The downloaded content is stored in the ${SHARE_PATH} path, for example, /test/file.zip. If you want to download multiple objects in a file, enter the local path, for example, /test/

extend_prop.show_placeholder: File path to the local storage, for example, /output/ indicates that OBS files are downloaded to the ${SHARE_PATH}/output folder.

validation.required_message: Local file path cannot be empty
